jobs.title: IT Consultant
jobs.jobDescription: As an IT Consultant at UV Group, you will work closely with clients to understand their business needs and design customized IT solutions to drive their digital transformation. You will guide clients on cloud services, data analytics, and IT infrastructure optimization to ensure the highest level of performance and security.
keyResponsibilities: Collaborate with clients to assess their IT needs and develop tailored solutions.
Implement and manage cloud infrastructure and IT systems.
Provide expert advice on IT and digital transformation strategies.
Conduct training and support for clients on new technologies.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in IT consulting and cloud solutions.
Strong understanding of enterprise systems, data analytics, and IT infrastructure.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field
Relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Microsoft Azure) are a plus
jobs.applyInstructions: Send your resume and cover letter to careers@uvgroup.com.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist to develop and execute data-driven marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, engagement, and business growth. You will work on creating innovative campaigns across various digital channels including social media, SEO, email marketing, and more.
keyResponsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing strategies.
Create engaging content for websites, social media, and other digital platforms.
Manage SEO, SEM, and email marketing campaigns.
Analyze campaign performance and optimize for better results.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in digital marketing and SEO.
Strong knowledge of Google Analytics, SEM tools, and social media platforms.
Creative thinking and the ability to drive results.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
Google Analytics certification is a plus
jobs.applyInstructions: Send your resume and cover letter to careers@uvgroup.com.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking a passionate Mobile App Developer to design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications. You will work on building scalable, user-friendly apps that align with client needs and business goals.
keyResponsibilities: Design and develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Collaborate with backend developers and designers to create seamless user experiences.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to app performance.
requiredSkills: Proficiency in programming languages like Swift, Kotlin, and React Native.
Experience in developing mobile applications for iOS and Android.
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
3+ years of experience in mobile app development
Experience with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries
jobs.applyInstructions: Send your resume and cover letter to careers@uvgroup.com.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.jobDescription: As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for interpreting complex data sets and transforming them into actionable insights. You will work closely with clients to analyze enterprise data, create reports, and provide recommendations to optimize their business strategies.
keyResponsibilities: Collect, analyze, and interpret large sets of data.
Provide actionable insights through data visualizations and reports.
Collaborate with teams to implement data-driven strategies.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity in reports and analyses.
requiredSkills: Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role.
Strong knowledge of SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Ability to interpret data and provide actionable recommendations.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field
Certification in data analytics or business intelligence (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus
2+ years of experience in data analysis
jobs.applyInstructions: Send your resume and cover letter to careers@uvgroup.com.
